lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: its the gift of giving...
lender.occupational_info: I have a company that helps other companies connect to the internet and manage servers for thier web-sites.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I am a very fortunate person.

lender.name: J.D. Paulsel
lender.loan_because: Micro-loans are one of the most effective ways to help build struggling infrastructures in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business student at Indiana University

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to better their lives! I admire hard working people & i believe that lending them some money is the least i can do to help them out some.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a 2nd year dental student. I am really excited about my future career and i am working very hard now to become a competent dentist.

lender.name: Kien-Peng
lender.loan_because: I am opposed to the tyranny of the Western intellectual property regime.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: lending feels good

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: It directly benefits the people, and at least I know where the money is going. Sort of.
lender.occupational_info: Research on diet and immunity

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: money is like blood, it needs to circulate to fullfill it's purpose.
lender.occupational_info: early retirement from General Motors (auto company), caretaker, garden, knit and create projects and events that call to me

lender.name: NHC Leading Ladies
lender.occupation: New Harvest Church Leading Ladies support missions
lender.loan_because: We are women who intentionally and faithfully devote ourselves to personal training for the development of Christian character and effectiveness for the Glory of God and support women internationally.

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: A key to a successful world economy is unification.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business student

lender.name: Brigitte
lender.loan_because: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply,with greater vision,with a finer spirit of hope and acheivement. You are here to enrich the world. (Woodrow Wilson)
lender.occupational_info: Pay it forward with Random Acts Kindness...

lender.name: Patrick
lender.occupational_info: Student at The Ohio State University.

lender.name: Michael & Mykah
lender.loan_because: It's a great opportunity to leverage the power of technology to make a difference in the world. I'm particularly excited to be able to share in the experience with my daughter.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the service organization for high tech company here in Silicon Valley. Mykah is a student at San Jose State University studying to earn her degree in neonatal nursing.

lender.name: Stacey and Don
lender.loan_because: We're fortunate, happy people, looking to pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: Stacey manages commercial real estate, and Don is a city planner

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: I can and I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a veterinarian at a research facility whose main focus is on infectious diseases particularly those that are found throughout many Third World countries (AIDS, TB, Yellow Fever, and malaria...).

lender.name: Vinay & Suchitra
lender.loan_because: We really believe in the microlending concept to help people out.
lender.occupational_info: Vinay works for a division of Lonza that produces the active ingredients that go into disinfectants and sanitizers. Suchitra is an accomplished artist (water colors, oils, acrylics, and pastels)

lender.name: McNamee
lender.loan_because: I believe no one should be disadvantaged by their lack of resources or finances.
lender.occupational_info: Creative design for the internet and print.

lender.name: tyler & tashina
lender.loan_because: it's tight

lender.name: Jackson
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate in life. Why not pay it forward?

lender.name: The Rutherfords
lender.loan_because: Economic stability is based on the wealth of the region. Kiva provides a great vehicle for us to share our region's stability without requiring that others do everything "our way".
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare and technology workers.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Money should be no barrier to a person with focus and motivation.

lender.name: Lisa G
lender.loan_because: it is nice to look out for other people who are making an effort to help themselves........

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: It seems a great way to help entrepreneurs in other countries who might otherwise find it difficult to get loans. It is much more empowering than charity.

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: We are all connected, Even if living separated by oceans our life is inescapable bounded. When we make a loan , we help vulnerable people to meet their most basic needs, we help the world out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: Creative.

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: I believe that those with the will and the abilities to lift themselves out of poverty by their own means should not stopped just because they have no access to traditional credit. Making the world a better place one drop of water at time :-)
lender.occupational_info: Currently pursuing CMU Masters in Software Engineering

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I believe in dreams.

lender.name: CardHub.com
lender.occupation: Credit Cards, Prepaid Cards, Gift Cards
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is one of the best paths out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: A successful internet company in the financial services sector.

lender.name: Patricia, Cindy, Gen
lender.loan_because: we can.

lender.name: win
lender.loan_because: I wanted to open his own business
lender.occupational_info: My job is to be an internet cafe operator. I started to work from 3 pm to 11 PM. much time is wasted for the family. therefore, I want to open my own business so I have a lot of time for my family.

lender.name: Shop
lender.occupational_info: Shopdax is the ultimate online shopping website. Shop sporting goods, outdoor gear, cycling products, and much more. Compare prices from multiples stores and save money at Shopdax. Much more than a comparison shopping engine, Shopdax is a unique shopping experience.

lender.name: Riccardo
lender.loan_because: Because I love people and cambodian people are in my heart.

lender.name: Terry & Marion
lender.loan_because: We understand there are many in this world who deserve the chance to fulfill their dreams and better their living conditions.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired pastrycook who now makes soap moulds to for those who want to make their own soap at home. I still enjoy cooking.

lender.name: Elia
lender.occupation: volunteer teacher and M. in CA

lender.name: Mandi
lender.loan_because: my best friend invited me through a gift certificate for my birthday. I have seen the possible impact I can have through a small donation and I want to continue the process through giving and re-giving my birthday gift.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Spanish to high school students grades 10-12. My students are ages 15-18, both boys and girls. The school in which I work provides a quality education to more than 2,500 students in one building.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I care to make people's lives better !!!

lender.name: Damien
lender.loan_because: I think this is an excellent way to make real improvement in peoples day to day lives. We all know how hard it is to access credit, so this will hopefully make it easier to get some business off the ground.
lender.occupational_info: Travelled alot in the past, and saw first hand the plight of many in South America.

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: I believe every little bit helps. Kiva offers a great way of giving direct support.

lender.name: CASID
lender.loan_because: Andrea, Ann, Ashley, Barbara, Bre, Diane, Elizabeth, Helen, Lynn, and Shelley are great team members!
lender.occupational_info: We work on issues related to the enhancement of well-being in communities around the world.

lender.name: Petra
lender.loan_because: A small donation (by me) can be a huge difference for someone else. Life is to be enjoyed.. by everyone!
lender.occupational_info: During my travels, I saw a lot of hardworking people struggling to survive. By joining Kiva, I hope to make there dreams come true.

lender.name: Michelle n Zoe
lender.loan_because: I believe in good :)
lender.occupational_info: I work with a child with cerebral palsy. It is highly rewarding.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I know that I am helping someone or some groups that need it. I have come to understand how much even a small amount can impact the lives of many.
lender.occupational_info: I am not only a student but I do work full-time and volunteer in my community. I am going to school to become a nurse as I have been working in the health field for 5 years now. I currently work at the children's hospital as a technician where I assist the nurses and doctor's with procedures. I work in the emergency room, so it is very fast paced and demanding. I also volunteer as a firefighter.

lender.name: Chad Cronk
lender.loan_because: It feels right to help other's.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get what they need.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: To level the economic playing field on this planet.
lender.occupational_info: helping people protecting places, such as rivers

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I believe in independent people!
lender.occupational_info: I make new devices to fill people's needs

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by Muhammad Yunus and the Grameen Bank. I also think that people helping people brings us all closer together and leads to a more caring, better informed, and more just world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with international students coming to Canada and Canadian students looking to study overseas.

lender.name: DART-DOR(Drug & Alcohol Research Team)
lender.occupation: Drug and Alcohol Health Services Researchers

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that I'm helping someone make a better life that I'll never meet.
lender.occupational_info: If people get hurt in a car accident, I pay their medical bills.

lender.name: Chantel
lender.loan_because: My family and I have traveled to places where we have witnessed first hand the struggles of people in countries such as Guatemala, Dominican Republic, Mexico and the Philippines
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to have a husband who works and earns enough money so that I can care for our home and our children.

lender.name: Kristian
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good way to make a difference. An efficient support to active people who can make a difference for themselves and others.
lender.occupational_info: Working for the local administration on agriculture issues representing local and sentral authorites.

lender.name: Credo Reference
lender.loan_because: Credo's staff wants to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Credo's corporate mission is to bring to worldwide learners and librarians electronic reference products that they simply cannot do without.

lender.name: Charlie Hall
lender.loan_because: I'm happy to help a young Entrepreneur continue his success & grow his business.
lender.occupational_info: Retail Banking Consultant, with over 40 years of working with Retail Businesses of all types in my Career. Both Start up & Established.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I love to help out if I can. Every little bit helps. And if you can give some assistance, you should :)
lender.occupational_info: We run an electronic cigarette business online.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Well the only way to help is to help someone help themselves. This is a great idea creating opportunity. I am not giving I'm creating opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student for software engineering and am a painter.

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Leah Wilson
lender.loan_because: As an Entrepreneur I understand the importance of finding the funds to build and expand a business. It is important to me to pay forward to other aspiring Entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business development and operations manager for new and emerging businesses. I help entrepreneurs successfully build and expand their operations to gain financial independence.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.occupational_info: Window Cleaning Eavestrough Cleaning Screen Repair

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference - however small - to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children between the ages of 6 and 11.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Kindness = Intelligence
lender.occupational_info: Commercial / Industrial Waterproof Reflective Roof Coatings and Residential / Commercial Metal Roofing

lender.name: Kelly

lender.name: Shawna
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I run the front desk at a biotech incubator. This means I help about 30 life science start-up companies every day.

lender.name: MohamedRedissi
lender.loan_because: To empower those who wish to improve their lives. Pour aider ceux qui souhaitent améliorer leurs vies.
lender.occupational_info: Automotive Engineer.

lender.name: kristi
lender.loan_because: my family would like to give to those in need instead of giving gifts to eachother this year for Christmas.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Sales Lead at a women's clothing store..I help manage our store's selling team and try to make our customers feel beautiful by providing undivided customer service and style expertise.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I want to positively impact hardworking people in a way that will benefit them and their community over the long term.
lender.occupational_info: I help start-up companies and people take an idea and grow it into an organization and company that is stable and sustainable.

lender.name: coffeeguys
lender.loan_because: We all believe in helping others less fortunate.

lender.name: Lowell
lender.loan_because: It is a skillful use of money.

lender.name: Conor
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs are worth supporting
lender.occupational_info: I work as a doctor in Brisbane, Australia

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: We all need help some times.
lender.occupational_info: I run a research organization in a college library.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I want to help those that need the help.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: As corny as it sounds - I want to save the world. And until I win the lottery and give away copious amounts of monetary goods - this is the perfect way to help on a person to person level!

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I believe that providing people with capital assistance, to create their own opportunities for generating a livelihood, is another great avenue for eliminating a portion of the worlds poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help clients find the right people to help make their companies productive.

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: It's fun!
lender.occupational_info: I design web pages.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: I have lived under the "poverty" level( for the U.S.) all my adult life, yet I could not reconcile the fact that I have more than 83% of all the other people on this planet. So a stinky hippie from Alaska CAN actually be the change I want to see in the World;.;]; !
lender.occupational_info: I started a summer day tour for visitors to my town. We kayak down the river that flows through town, have lunch at a restaurant and ride bicycles back to the start. My family helped me start it and now it's up to me to make it work. I hope everyone can have the opportunity to be so empowered.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I want to help out where I can!
lender.occupational_info: My work is interesting and exciting: I influence others to experience and share the love of Christ!

lender.name: Team Tia
lender.loan_because: We can!
lender.occupational_info: Gypsies at heart who play and dream on purpose.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: sharing is caring.....
lender.occupational_info: As a Naturopath I incorporate healing herbs, homoeopathy, nutrition and bodywork into my treatment plan. As a Yoga Instructor I believe that Yoga is for all ages and all fitness levels. Yoga is life and Yoga is fun.

lender.name: Lorien
lender.loan_because: This is the best idea I've seen so far.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It is a good way to share how God has blessed me and my family.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and networks at a large company that has 400 office locations around the world.

lender.name: kelly
lender.loan_because: my friend got me into it and felt like I need to do something to help people out because my friend is so giving and takes action so she sort of inspired me!
lender.occupational_info: Student!

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I can. I care.
lender.occupational_info: Mike Saunders holds an MBA in Marketing and serves the small and medium-sized business market. In addition to coaching and consulting clients in his firm Marketing Huddle LLC, Mike also is a Marketing Consultant with the Denver Small Business Development Center (SBDC). His unique application of Marketing Integration Principles helps his clients use the Internet to grow their businesses quickly while reducing marketing and advertising costs. By visiting www.MarketingHuddle.com you can get his 2-hour Marketing Coaching product for FREE view the "interview with Mike" to learn more about his unique approach to marketing.

lender.name: Jan Paul
lender.loan_because: Loans are paid back and can be used multiple times. Money that is simply donated is used, but lost after it has been expended. Basically, loans can support more people with the same money.
lender.occupational_info: Helping companies and institutions base their environmetally relevant decisions on quantitative science.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It gives me pleasure.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: JJ Becker
lender.loan_because: My mom loaned this as a gift in my name.
lender.occupational_info: Making sure people have a great dining expereince

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: If a person has the ability to help another human being then it is a duty and a pleasure.
lender.occupational_info: I build roads using heavy equipment like bulldozers and track excavators, in the winter I help build ice roads in the Prudhoe Bay area in Alaska. The ice roads are used so the tundra is not damaged, and gives a working surface for the pipe fitters as they build pipeline.

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: I want to help others make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: fulfilling and an opportunity to help many Canadian charities carry out their good work.

lender.name: Oskar
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It is good and right for everyone to give what they have to others. It is the way Jesus taught us to live. When I learned about microlending, I thought Kiva sounded like a great tool to get people all over the world to get those in need started, and eventually pay it back so the good can be done over and over!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a land planner, specializing in environmental planning (conserving water resources and open space). I work for a local government.

lender.name: Karen & John
lender.loan_because: I CAN make a difference, even if it's $25 at a time!
lender.occupational_info: My husband is retired and I work part-time for ADP Payroll Processing

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: Kiva's online platform bridges socioeconomic realms in the global system.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a a former Kiva Fellows Program Intern and current Kiva Fellow!

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: it is a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I order medications from drug company patient assistance programs for people who can't afford to buy medicine.

lender.name: Barrett
lender.occupational_info: I build webpages.

lender.name: WIlliam
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the United States Naval Academy

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I try to teach my students to think globally. This is one way I can have a global impact.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school English and Speech in a rural community of about 3000 people.

lender.name: Tim & Diane
lender.loan_because: We loan because of Matt. 25:40.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the YMCA and she in the legal profession. Our life's work is to represent him to others through a life that ignites, illuminates and motivates a Christ like faith in others.

lender.name: omar
lender.loan_because: I should. We all should. We have an obligation to lend a hand and help each other.

lender.name: BenjyMouse
lender.loan_because: people deserve a chance to help themselves
